name: Hiran is a girl from Sistan
description:
Hiran is a little girl from Sistan and Baluchestan, Iran, who is resting and eating after a lot of work. This piece is from the "Forgotten" collection, which will be displayed in one of the galleries in 2022.
Technique: Oil on canvas that is substituted with clay and wood glue.
The main size of the painting: 60 x 90 cm
Digital size: 5178 x 3488
